post_description:
GoPro Awards recipient "KWOON" is one talented + creative musician. His dream is to play live music in the most spectacular places on Earth‚Äîin nature, the wild, + where nobody has played a guitar solo before. In this iteration of his dream, KWOON performed a live recording of a new song while his chrome guitar floated 101,000 feet into space via a weather balloon. Thanks to GPS tracking, he was able to find the landing site + recover the GoPro + its footage so you could enjoy this music video from the stratosphere.

A feature documentary from Level 1, coming to theaters Fall 2023. Find a screening near you and learn more at https://fullcirclefilm.co/

Faced with a traumatic injury that renders you permanently disabled, how would you reinvent yourself? In 2014, Trevor Kennison's life was forever altered by a broken back - for worse and for better, in equal measures.

Full Circle is both an unblinking examination of the challenges of life after spinal cord injury... and a celebration of the opportunity for growth that such a tragedy can present.

Featuring Trevor Kennison and Barry Corbet. A Level 1 Production, in association with Abramorama and XYZ Films. Directed by Josh Berman, and made possible with support from Eddie Bauer, Volkl Skis, SPY+, Fat Tire, CMH Heli Skiing, GoPro, Jackson Hole, Ikon Pass, High Fives Foundation, the KHR Family Fund, and Darn Tough VT.

Follow Level 1 Productions: https://www.instagram.com/level1/
Follow Trevor Kennison: https://www.instagram.com/trevor_kennison/
Find a screening near you and learn more at https://fullcirclefilm.co/
For more from GoPro, check out The Current: https://gopro.com/news

Freestyle Kayak World Champion, Dane Jackson has a flair for the extreme, which is why he traveled to Santo Domingo, Mexico to tame the rapids of the mighty Angel Wings Falls. With 4 waterfalls spanning 300 vertical feet in just 1/5 mile, this section of river is the steepest navigable whitewater sequence in the world. The first drop of the series is Angel Wings Falls. Clocking in at 80ft, it demands perfection + confidence‚ÄîDane's forte. Strap into the boat for his HERO12 Black POV of this beautiful + one-of-a-kind water feature.

Every year, the world's most talented mountain biking athletes gather at The Swatch Nines to push the limits of the sport on a one-of-a-kind jump line. This year, GoPro Athlete Bienvenido Aguado took freestyle biking to the next level by stomping the world's first Cliffhanger Front Flip. Join us for a behind-the-scenes look at what all goes down to make a historic trick like this come to fruition. Special thanks to Casey Brown, Elias Ruso, Sam Reynolds, + Nicholi Rogatkin for all of the coverage from Green Hill Bikepark in Germany.

Wireless audio for professional sound + extended range. HERO12 Black connects to Apple AirPods, Bluetooth earbuds, or other wireless mics. This new feature allows vloggers + creators to record audio from their connected device, in addition to the natural audio from the camera. You can also control HERO12 with Voice Control via your connected headset + hear camera alerts to ensure it's doing what you intended. After your get the shot, use playback mode + listen to the audio directly in your ears.

HERO12 Black can take a beating. Straight out of the box, it's waterproof to 33ft (10m) + ready for thick mud, deep snow, + pounding surf. The replaceable lens cover also features a water-repellant coating that sheds water droplets to keep your shots crystal clear when you're in the water. Max Lens Mod 2.0 is no different, with a 2x more scratch resistant coating that's also hydrophobic + waterproof.

HERO12 Black shines when the sun goes down. Its 3 Time Lapse Modes let you get creative in the dead of night, even with Max Lens Mod 2.0 attached. Alongside each Night Effects video you capture, HERO12 Black will also output a high-resolution photo for an easy way to share your masterpiece.

With the push of a button, you can capture:
üí´ Star Trails - Use the Earth‚Äôs rotation + stars to capture beautiful light trails across the night sky.
üé® Light Painting - Create brilliant brush stroke effects with moving light.
üöó Vehicle Light Trails - Blend night-time traffic to record stunning light trail shots.

Widest. Tallest. Ultimate POV. Upgrade your HERO12 Black by bundling it with the new Max Lens Mod 2.0. This lens attachment offers an industry-leading, 177¬∞ FOV at 4K60 in Max HyperView + 48% wider vertical video in Max SuperView, without the need to mount vertically. With Max Lens Mod 2.0 attached, you'll also see a 36% FOV increase in widescreen capture when compared to the standard HERO12 Black. You'll also unlock Max #HyperSmooth + 360¬∞ horizon lock in all resolutions + lenses. And if you're looking for slo-mo, try the new 1080p120 video for 1/4 speed footage at a maxed-out FOV. Like to get rough? Max Lens Mod 2.0 is hydrophobic + 2x more scratch resistant than its predecessor, while maintaining a slimmer profile.

Pre-order HERO12 Black + Max Lens Mod now at https://GoPro.com/HERO12Bundle

Blown highlights + lost shadows are a thing of the past with the addition of High Dynamic Range (HDR) video modes in HERO12 Black. By exposing each video frame at 2 different levels + combining them into 1 balanced image, this new-to-GoPro setting captures details that might typically be lost in bright + dark areas of your footage. The result is life-like videos that replicate the high dynamic range of the human eyes üëÄ

Shaky video is long gone. HyperSmooth 6.0 continues to raise the bar for in-camera video stabilization, giving you impossibly-smooth footage in every video mode, no matter how rough it gets. If you don't know how wild your ride will be, the upgraded AutoBoost offers more stabilization with less cropping‚Äîensuring you get the widest + smoothest shots possible. Enhanced 360¬∞ Horizon Lock also allows your camera to rotate a full 360¬∞ while still maintaining perfectly level footage with the Linear + HL Digital Lens. You won‚Äôt need a gimbal or stabilization software for pro-quality results.

Attach Max Lens Mod 2.0 if you want the highest stabilization possible on HERO12 Black with Max HyperSmooth. You‚Äôll also get Horizon Lock for all lenses, plus 1080p120 video for ultra stable 4x slo-mo footage with a maxed out FOV.

Pre-order HERO12 Black + Max Lens Mod 2.0 at https://GoPro.com/HERO12Bundle

HERO12 Black delivers industry-leading quality + ultimate versatility in one package. Its immersive 8:7 sensor delivers ultra-high resolution 5.3K60 + 4K120 video. A new 4K Vertical Capture Mode for Reels, TikTok, + YouTube Shorts simplifies mounting + post production for social media creators. Want to slow things down? 240FPS modes enable ultra slow-mo at 1/8 the speed of real time. Then, there's High Dynamic Range video. HDR unlocks a realistic level of detail in your footage by exposing each frame to 2 different brightness levels + combining them into 1 balanced image. This new-to-GoPro setting lifts shadows + reduces highlights in a way that mimics what the human eye sees. #GoPro #GoProHERO12 #HyperSmooth #Videography

#ProTip: Enable our new GP-Log encoding LUT for maximum post-production control.

Double the runtimes, double the memories. HERO12 Black‚Äôs power management has been reengineered from the ground up to deliver up to 2x longer continuous recording in our highest performance video modes. The dramatically more efficient processing allows you to film for 70 mins at 5.3K60 (HERO12's highest setting), over 1.5 hours at 5.3K30, + 2.5 hours at 1080p30. For all you powder hounds, the advanced technology of the included 1720mAh Enduro Battery significantly extends runtimes at colder temperatures over previous GoPro cameras + batteries to deliver up to 2x longer continuous recording, in our highest performance video modes, before hitting thermal limits.

Pre-order now at https://GoPro.com/HERO12

This is everything you need to know about the new HERO12 Black. Best-in-class image quality + video stabilization come together with a huge boost in battery runtimes to bring you the most versatile, most capable, most feature-packed HERO camera ever.

üó£Ô∏è Global viewers, tap the settings icon in the bottom-right corner of the video to select an audio track for your preferred language.

Our new camera takes industry-leading 5.3K video + adds High Dynamic Range (HDR) to capture once-in-a-lifetime moments in even more detail. Thanks to the improved power management, HERO12 Black delivers 2x longer continuous recording at 5.3K60 (70 minutes). Tough, lightweight + easily mountable for hands-free recording, it‚Äôs ready for anything, all while advanced video stabilization from HyperSmooth 6.0 keeps your footage smooth in the roughest conditions. After recording, simply plug in your GoPro + your footage will automatically upload to the cloud. A highlight video will be sent to your phone that lets you relive your adventures + share the fun.

Pre-Order HERO12 Black: https://GoPro.com/HERO12
Pre-Order HERO12 Black + Max Lens Mod 2.0: https://GoPro.com/HERO12Bundle

For a select group of humans, the ocean is where they call home. Josh Shankle + Rachel Moore departed from their land-based life in Ventura, California for a new journey on the deck + in the ocean. The adventure-fueled couple travels the world on the 42' Tayana sailboat named, "Agapƒì". Together they explore the most remote island chains, scuba + free dive with the most incredible wildlife, and get to appreciate the the immense beauty that covers 71% of our planet. Hop onboard and experience what it's like to live life without bounds + to follow only the wind and tides.

Meet Hyphen. Shot on #GoPro
¬†
Hyphen is a revolutionary ‚Äòcobot‚Äô (collaborative robot), an automated assistant designed to work in tandem with Chipotle team members. Hyphen is being tuned to craft perfectly portioned burrito bowls and salads along an automated makeline, while a crew member makes burritos, tacos, and quesadillas above the line.
¬†
Chipotle‚Äôs investment in Hyphen originates from Cultivate Next, a $50 million fund targeting early-stage innovations that align with Chipotle‚Äôs mission to Cultivate a Better World.
¬†
Around 65% of Chipotle‚Äôs digital orders consist of bowls or salads, so with Hyphen on board, team members would be freed up to focus on guest experiences, while increasing the amount of digital orders during peak periods.
